page.title: 07EDUCATION cont. & GOVERNMENT
page.content:
school in 1930.The school raises money from its open days when the parents visit their children. Money is also raised for national appeals. The money is spent on the school's trips to Youth Hostels and camping.Groups of children at the school enjoy going swimming, cycling, playing snooker and break dancing. The school has a large field, a playground and playrooms.
{GOVERNMENT} There is no Hayling parish council. Havant Borough Council is responsible for the provision of parks, dustbin collection,road sweeping and cleaning, schools, transportation,police duties. You are eligible to vote at the age of 18. A list of electors is formulated every year in Autumn. Voting is not compulsary. There are 6 borough councillors for Hayling and there is
